flavorText:
"The only true immortality is in dying for a cause."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

foreignData.name: Martyrium
foreignData.text: Du kannst bis zum Ende des Zuges jeglichen Schaden auf eine Zielkreatur, die Du kontrollierst, umleiten.

name: Martyrdom
originalText: Until end of turn, you may redirect to target creature you control any amount of damage.

rulings.text: If the target stops being a creature, you can’t redirect damage to it until/unless it becomes a creature again.
If the target creature is not still on the battlefield when the damage is to be redirected, the damage stays where it is.
Can be used to redirect damage from that creature to itself. This has no particularly useful effect.

text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
